amendment.description: To redirect $396 billion into a reserve fund to strengthen the Social Security trust funds over the long term.

vote.text: Amendment SA 420 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 93.

action.text: Amendment SA 420 proposed by Senator Breaux. (consideration: CR S4355-4356; text: CR S4355-4356) To redirect $396 billion into a reserve fund to strengthen the Social Security trust funds over the long term.
